alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:35PM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph into early evening then slowly diminishing. For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow expected of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Ontonagon and Gogebic Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility times. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause some power outages. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
